Articles.Content:
Ok! so! there is one thing that I personally get bored of in ksp, you cant talk to ATC, other pilots, etc. So! (if anyone's interested) We can gather a group of people on a discord+DMP server, and do ATC things, like at a airport (squaking, IFR clearances, VFR clearances, stuff like that) For squawking, 1200 is for VFR flight, and to best simulate transponders, rename your aircraft to a well, aircraft. For IFR, use 1000 (turn ship to lander), loss of radio is 7600, and turn ship to a relay, and 7700 is emergency (turn ship to station). we can decide who shall be in the tower before we start!

Rules:

please stay professional on the server during flight

no mods in DMP server

we will be using real ATC terms, be prepared

name your ship your call sign!

 

If there is already a thread like this, please bring it to my attention

say that you are interested in the thread, or in a PM to me, and I will PM you the server invite

If someone could set up the DMP server, that would be fantastic, or I could try and do it myself, or we could use a empty server

This isn't a forum game, it is a discussion.

@Vanamonde
Actually, Mods, please delete this thread
We can close the thread if you want, but there's no harm in it. You sure?
